ThingDef.label: stunning turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to stun an opponent for a short time. Requires medicine to replenish the stunning rounds. This turret does not do damage. Does not explode.

ThingDef.label: stunning-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: stunning-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: tazing turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to taze a target. Requires medicine to refill the shots after heavy use. This turret does light damage, and will try to down a target. Does not explode.

ThingDef.label: tazing-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: tazing-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: sniper turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take out targets at long distances. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 4 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: sniper-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: standard turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret which is a direct upgrade to the mini-turret. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 4 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: standard-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: energy turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to shoot lazers. Does not require ammunition, instead it consumes a large amount power. Powerful chaos and supressive abilities, though low damage output. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged, and due to its unstable nature it's more likely to catch fire and explode.

ThingDef.label: energy-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: energy-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: heavy turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take a lot of damage, in exchange it doesn't do a lot of damage. These are meant as front line targets. Requires a lot of steel to refurbish its barrel after use. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: heavy-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: shredder turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take on targets with low or no armor. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Very unlikely to explode out to 2 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: shredder-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: concussive turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to shoot explosive bullets. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: concussive-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: EMP turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take on mechanoids. Not effective against fleshy targets. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: EMP-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
